Programmer, FrontEnd Developer.

Info

A third-year student of Belorussian State University of Faculty of Radiophysics and Computer Technology. Current English level: B2. From my university I learned C++(Main Programming algorithms and OOP). Also I've learned FrontEnd(HTML5, CSS, JavaScript(React,Redux)) and keep learning! Additionally I want to learn Java properly to work on BackEnd and become FullStack Developer. On top of that I'm interested in working with Databases.
